sentences.en: Everybody rushing about on some incomprehensible errand someone forced him to do at pain of death.
sentences.cn: 大家都忍受着死亡的痛苦被迫地抢着做一些令人难以理解的差事。

sentences.en: For a moment he forgot his errand.
sentences.cn: 有一小会儿,他忘掉了自己的使命.

sentences.en: Get them a drink or a coffee, do a chore for them, offer to do an errand, anything they’d appreciate, really.
sentences.cn: 为人递上一杯饮料或咖啡，做一些零星杂务，为别人提供一份差使等等使人感激的事情。 真的。

sentences.en: He bustled the maid off on an errand.
sentences.cn: 他催女佣赶快去办差事.

sentences.en: He could scarcely eat, however, he was so anxious to be about his errand.
sentences.cn: 可是他急着去办事,几乎什么也吃不下.

sentences.en: He quickly set out on his errand of mercy (= journey to help someone in danger ).
sentences.cn: 他迅速启程参加救援行动。

sentences.en: He sent me on a fool's errand .
sentences.cn: 他派我去干白费力的事。

sentences.en: His errand - running capacity also improved.
sentences.cn: 他做家务事的能力也有所提高.

sentences.en: I seemed to spend my life running errands for people.
sentences.cn: 我好像一辈子都在为别人跑腿。

sentences.en: I want'ee to go on an errand for me.
sentences.cn: 俺要你去给俺送个信儿.

sentences.en: I was in no way to blame for the annoying errand.
sentences.cn: 这件讨厌的差事一点儿也怨不上我.

sentences.en: I've come on a special errand.
sentences.cn: 我是专程来办一件差事的.

sentences.en: It revealed nothing of the speaker's errand.
sentences.cn: 听不出她到底想干什么.

sentences.en: It was not an errand that much pleased the doctor.
sentences.cn: 这种差使医生可不大喜欢干.

sentences.en: It was the cold of his errand, a foot's errand.
sentences.cn: 这是因为这趟奔走肯定徒劳无功而感到发冷 吧.

sentences.en: She looked upon him as her errand - man and humble slave.
sentences.cn: 在她看来,他不过是跑腿的佣人,低下的奴才.

sentences.en: She was always sending me on errands.
sentences.cn: 她老是支使我。

sentences.en: She went off on some errand.
sentences.cn: 她办事去了。

sentences.en: The nature of her errand he could not divine.
sentences.cn: 对于她为何而来,他无法推测.

sentences.en: They can view a list of errands that match their interest profile, and, by entering a price, can bid to perform the errand.
sentences.cn: 他们可以查看与他们的兴趣简档匹配的差事列表，并且，通过输入价格，可以为执行差事投标。

sentences.en: Unable to get about, she sent Joy on one errand after another.
sentences.cn: 她自己动不了窝,便派小福子一趟八趟的去买东西.

phrases.tran_cn: 徒劳的奔波；徒劳无功的工作

trans.tran_en: a short journey in order to do something for someone, for example delivering or collecting something for them
